message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product! I think you'll really love it.
Thanks for the offer, Alice!  I'm interested, but $140 is a bit higher than I'm hoping for.  Would you be willing to go down to $130?
I understand you're looking to save a bit, Bob. I can do $135, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that.
